Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cardclasses

Class Deck<T extends Card>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.cardclasses.Deck<T>
  • public class Deck<T extends Card>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represent a generic pair of lists of cards.

    These lists can be made up of Weapon cards, Powerup cards or AmmoTile cards.

    See Also:
    Weapon, Powerup, AmmoTile

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Deck()
      This constructor initializes all attributes to null.
      It's mainly used for Jackson JSON files fetching.
      Deck​(java.util.ArrayList<T> activeCards, java.util.ArrayList<T> inactiveCards)
      This constructor initializes the pair of decks.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void discard​(T card)
      This method add one given card to the inactiveCards deck to be discarded.
      T draw()
      This method allows to draw a new card from the activeCards list.
      java.util.ArrayList<T> getActiveCards()
      This method returns the arraylist of Cards of the deck from which all players draw new cards.
      java.util.ArrayList<T> getInactiveCards()
      This method returns the arraylist of Cards from the deck of discarded cards.

      It's mainly used for Jackson JSON files fetching.

      It's mainly used for Jackson JSON files fetching.
      void shuffle()
      This method randomizes the activeCards list order.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Deck

        public Deck​(java.util.ArrayList<T> activeCards,
            java.util.ArrayList<T> inactiveCards)
        This constructor initializes the pair of decks.

        This constructor should be invoked only in a game setup phase.

        Parameters:
        activeCards - a list of cards ready to be drawn.
        inactiveCards - a list of discarded cards. During the game setup it is initialized to null.

      • Deck

        public Deck()
        This constructor initializes all attributes to null.
        It's mainly used for Jackson JSON files fetching.

    • Method Detail

      • getActiveCards

        public java.util.ArrayList<T> getActiveCards()
        This method returns the arraylist of Cards of the deck from which all players draw new cards.
        Returns:
        an arraylist of Cards representing the cards deck.

      • getInactiveCards

        public java.util.ArrayList<T> getInactiveCards()
        This method returns the arraylist of Cards from the deck of discarded cards.
        Returns:
        an arraylist of Cards of the discarded cards deck.

      • setActiveCards

        public void setActiveCards​(java.util.ArrayList<T> activeCards)
        This method sets a ArrayList of Cards to be the new activeCards attribute.
        It's mainly used for Jackson JSON files fetching.
        Parameters:
        activeCards - an ArrayList of Cards to be used as new activeCards attribute.

      • setInactiveCards

        public void setInactiveCards​(java.util.ArrayList<T> inactiveCards)
        This method sets a ArrayList of Cards to be the new inactiveCards attribute.
        It's mainly used for Jackson JSON files fetching.
        Parameters:
        inactiveCards - an ArrayList of Cards to be used as new inactiveCards attribute.

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        This method randomizes the activeCards list order.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        This method takes inactiveCards deck and reuses it to generate a new deck for activeCards, then it clears the inactiveCards list.

        It should only be invoked when the activeCards list is empty and the inactiveCards list is not empty.

      • draw

        public T draw()
        This method allows to draw a new card from the activeCards list.

        It will automatically reset and shuffles a deck using its inactive cards if it runs out of cards to be drawn. If the inactive cards list is not used in a specific deck the reset will not occur. This excludes the auto-reset for Weapon decks.

        Returns:
        The card on top of the activeCards deck.

      • discard

        public void discard​(T card)
        This method add one given card to the inactiveCards deck to be discarded.
        Parameters:
        card - a T card to be discarded.
